page.title: 12HOUSING IN THE FENLAND AREA
page.content: In the local newspaper, there were several{properties}for sale during the week ending June 21st. In Gote Lane, {Gorefield,}there is a recently_extended, double bedroom bungalow valued at Â£29,950, "Oak lea," situated in Mill Lane,{Newton,}is on the market at Â£35,950. This is a spacious, 4_bedroom bungalow with full central heating, situated in 0.5 acres of land."Riverside_Lodge" in{Gorefield is a restored and modernised 5_bedroom farmhouse. It is described as being "in a remote position" but well worth viewing.The value is Â£44,950.Available in{Newton}is a well maintained, modernised 3_bedroom, country cottage. Ideal for a first_time buyer,it has a pleasant village location and is valued at Â£16,500.
